name: Time Cops
description:
You play as a former Time Cop. Sick of the  corruption, you resigned a few years back. But through some loyal contacts, you learned of a plan to steal ancient artifacts. Your task is to get to them first. 

Go in, get the artifact, and get out.

Controls

  • Movement - WASD
  • Sword Attack - J
  • Gun Attack - K
  • Dodge - L

Made for LOWREZJAM 2021
